data.message: hi facebook pls.. back the old style ..

replies.message: Hi Ace. Updates are necessary to keep up with ever-changing technology. Is there something from the last version that you miss the most? Let us know at: http://on.fb.me/N9HWAG - Kristen

hello Facebook, the re-design of the Like button is intense. I don't think it should differ that much from either the old one or the Like buttons on webpages... just saying, I'm predicting losses in interaction. other than that - (y)

Hey guys, for the new fanpage design, im still missing the domain validation via the meta tag "<meta property="fb:admins" content="XXXXXXXXXX" />" https://www.facebook.com/insights/ so user could see a verified icon right of the linked domain, e.g. http://alexanderdross.com/fb_validation.jpg

Thanks for your feedback Peter! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/Na9cz1 - Kristen
is anyone here who is being using facebook since 2004 ya 2005 ?

Yoo facebook dude....i am like super poor ..so i cant afford the prices of promoting my page through ads..so i am requesting for a ''share for share''. Its like you share my page on your page....and i share your page on my page..!! s4s.??? you up for it zuck.???
